name: Zoooom!
description: Allows you to zoom while paused!

zoom-sensitivity.name: Zoom Speed
zoom-sensitivity.description: The zoom sensitivity. Higher values zoom in faster.

auto-hide-menu.name: Auto Hide Menu
auto-hide-menu.description: Automatically hides the menu when you zoom in.

auto-show-menu.name: Auto Show Menu
auto-show-menu.description: Automatically shows the menu when you zoom back out.

alt-disables-zoom.name: Alt Disables Zoom
alt-disables-zoom.description: Disables zooming while Alt is held.
